net.corda.core.node.services

Interface TxWritableStorageService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttachmentsStorageService, StorageService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StorageServiceImpl

    public TxWritableStorageService
extends StorageService

    Storage service, with extensions to allow validated transactions to be added to. For use only within ServiceHub.

    See Also:
    ServiceHub

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransactionStorage getValidatedTransactions()
      A map of hash->tx where tx has been signature/contract validated and the states are known to be correct. The signatures aren't technically needed after that point, but we keep them around so that we can relay the transaction data to other nodes that need it.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.corda.core.node.services.StorageService

        getStateMachineRecordedTransactionMapping, getUploaders, getValidatedTransactions

      • Methods inherited from interface net.corda.core.node.services.AttachmentsStorageService

        getAttachments

    • Method Detail

      • getValidatedTransactions

        TransactionStorage getValidatedTransactions()

        A map of hash->tx where tx has been signature/contract validated and the states are known to be correct. The signatures aren't technically needed after that point, but we keep them around so that we can relay the transaction data to other nodes that need it.
